name: FirstIgnite
headline: AI-Powered Business Development for Scientific Organizations
description: FirstIgnite builds AI powered business intelligence tools.

founders.name: Chase Bonhag, Founder
founders.description: Former VC investor in university research (Illinois Ventures) and corporate innovation (TechNexus).  Very focused on building tools to help scientific companies grow faster.

founders.name: Cody Pawlowski, Founder
founders.description: Cody is the Co-Founder and CTO of FirstIgnite: the #1 tool for university-industry collaboration. While attending UIUC, he cofounded his first startup, Convey, and pursued the venture full-time. The social listening platform predicted major elections such as Brexit and netted partnerships from political campaigns to drive outreach. He's now focused on using AI to help research institutions partner with industry—getting more breakthroughs to market.

generated_description:
**FirstIgnite: AI-Powered Business Development for Scientific Organizations**

Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator Batch S21, FirstIgnite is on a mission to revolutionize the way scientific organizations approach business development through AI-powered tools. Based in an undisclosed location, the company’s team of nine is dedicated to enhancing partnership opportunities for universities, hospitals, and national labs.

### What They Do

FirstIgnite provides innovative AI-driven business intelligence tools designed specifically for the scientific sector. Their platform simplifies the process of finding potential collaborators by letting users enter descriptions of their research or products. From that point, FirstIgnite uses intelligent matching to connect users with markets, companies, and key contacts that are aligned with their goals. This means more strategic partnerships and faster pathways to growth.

Here are some standout features of the platform:

- **Company Matching:** Helps organizations identify a vast network of companies interested in collaboration.
- **Market Search:** Delivers AI-driven market analysis that uncovers insights for innovations.
- **Summarization:** Converts complex research into industry-friendly terms for easier understanding.
- **People Search:** Finds decision-makers at target organizations to maximize outreach efforts.
- **Email Outreach:** Automates personalized email campaigns to engage potential partners effortlessly.

### The Impact

Users of FirstIgnite's tools have reported impressive outcomes:
- **70%** reduction in time spent creating marketing materials.
- **350%** increase in email outreach efficacy.
- **3x** growth in the number of partnerships formed.

### Why It Matters

In the rapidly evolving landscape of scientific research and innovation, the ability to forge partnerships can be the difference between stagnation and breakthrough success. By leveraging AI, FirstIgnite empowers organizations to navigate this complexity effectively, solving one of the biggest hurdles in research commercialization and collaboration.

If you’re part of a scientific organization looking to streamline your business development efforts, FirstIgnite is worth checking out. 

For more information, explore their offerings and start a free trial at [FirstIgnite.com](https://firstignite.com).
